alert.note: Alert for Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:22PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Columbus and north central Horry Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whiteville to near Bayboro. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Nakina, Redbug, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Green Sea, Brunswick and Columbus Regional Healthcare System. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
